metadata.title: CVE-2015-8625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.23.12, 1.24.x before 1.24.5, 1.25.x before 1.25.4, and1.26.x before 1.26.1 do not properly sanitize parameters when calling thecURL library, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an@ (at sign) character in unspecified POST array parameters.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
